attributes.additional_details:
We need all golfers, neighbours and friends of Bradley Park to help fight against this development.

The first part of the redevelopment process is a consultation period which starts on Monday 9th November and runs for 6 weeks until 21st December. 

In short, we have just 6 weeks to get the site off the development plan and keep this highly regarded public facility open. We urge everyone to sign this petition to help save one of the best municipal courses in the UK.
attributes.background: Bradley Park Golf Course is under threat of closure as the 120 acres site has been identified by Kirklees Council as a potential site for over 2000 new houses. This housing development would see the complete closure of our course.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can make your views known by contributing to the consultation process described in the petition. 

You could also start a petition to your council:

https://www.kirklees.gov.uk/you-kmc/contact/petitions.aspx
